decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game through various disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while also utilizing cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Omen of the Sea to maintain card advantage. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Thundertrap Trainer to close out the game. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for extra value and flexibility in the strategy. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure victory in the long game.

This deck focuses on aggressive play, utilizing powerful creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Kumano Faces Kakkazan to quickly put pressure on the opponent. Cards like Infuriate and Reckless Rage allow for quick bursts of damage, while cards like Fatal Push provide removal options. The deck also includes direct damage spells like Monstrous Rage and Heartfire Hero to finish off opponents or clear the way for attacks. The mana base is built around Blackcleave Cliffs and Blood Crypt, ensuring a consistent flow of resources for the aggressive strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and mana acceleration to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures, while also disrupting their game plan with cards that slow down their spells. By curving out with efficient creatures like Llanowar Elves and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain tempo throughout the game. Collected Company allows for additional creature deployment at instant speed, providing flexibility and surprise factor. The deck's mana base is designed to support its aggressive strategy while also incorporating utility lands for additional benefits.
